languages.text: {n}Вандалы клюнули на приманку — беззащитный караван, груженый провиантом. Банды пировали, не подозревая, что еда и питье приправлены мощными токсинами. Вскоре волна внезапных смертей прокатилась по пустошам, а за ней — безжалостный карательный рейд.{/n}

{n}The Vandals took the bait: a defenceless caravan laden with provisions. The gangs feasted, unaware that the food and drink were flavoured with powerful toxins. A wave of sudden deaths soon swept across the wastelands, followed by a ruthless punitive raid.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вандалы клюнули на приманку — беззащитный караван, груженый провиантом. Банды пировали, не подозревая, что еда и питье приправлены мощными токсинами. Вскоре волна внезапных смертей прокатилась по пустошам, а за ней — безжалостный карательный рейд.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Vandalen haben den Köder geschluckt: eine wehrlose, mit Vorräten beladene, Karawane. Die Banden haben gefeiert, ohne zu ahnen, dass die Speisen und Getränke mit starken Toxinen versetzt waren Bald erlebten die Ödlande eine Reihe plötzlicher Todesfälle, gefolgt von einer erbarmungslosen Strafaktion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vandals took the bait: a defenceless caravan laden with provisions. The gangs feasted, unaware that the food and drink were flavoured with powerful toxins. A wave of sudden deaths soon swept across the wastelands, followed by a ruthless punitive raid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Vandalen haben den Köder geschluckt: eine wehrlose, mit Vorräten beladene, Karawane. Die Banden haben gefeiert, ohne zu ahnen, dass die Speisen und Getränke mit starken Toxinen versetzt waren Bald erlebten die Ödlande eine Reihe plötzlicher Todesfälle, gefolgt von einer erbarmungslosen Strafaktion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Vandales ont mordu à l'hameçon : une caravane sans défense chargée de provisions. Les gangs se sont précipités sur le festin, sans savoir que la nourriture et la boisson avaient été additionnées de puissantes toxines. Une vague de morts soudaines a aussitôt déferlé sur les terres désolées, suivie d'un raid punitif impitoyable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vandals took the bait: a defenceless caravan laden with provisions. The gangs feasted, unaware that the food and drink were flavoured with powerful toxins. A wave of sudden deaths soon swept across the wastelands, followed by a ruthless punitive raid.{/n}

Une vague de morts soudaines a aussitôt déferlé sur les terres désolées, suivie d'un raid punitif impitoyable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Vándalos picaron el anzuelo: atacaron una caravana indefensa cargada de provisiones. La banda celebró un festín, ignorando que la comida y la bebida estaban condimentadas con poderosas toxinas. Una oleada de muertes repentinas recorrió los yermos, seguida de una incursión de castigo despiadada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vandals took the bait: a defenceless caravan laden with provisions. The gangs feasted, unaware that the food and drink were flavoured with powerful toxins. A wave of sudden deaths soon swept across the wastelands, followed by a ruthless punitive raid.{/n}

Una oleada de muertes repentinas recorrió los yermos, seguida de una incursión de castigo despiadada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴァンドたちは囮に引っかかった。食料を積んだ無防備なキャラバンを襲撃したのだ。ギャングどもはその食料や飲料が強力な毒物で味付けされていることに気づかずごちそうを食べた。ほどなくして突然死の波がウエストランドを襲い、無慈悲な制裁攻撃がそれに続いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vandals took the bait: a defenceless caravan laden with provisions. The gangs feasted, unaware that the food and drink were flavoured with powerful toxins. A wave of sudden deaths soon swept across the wastelands, followed by a ruthless punitive raid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴァンドたちは囮に引っかかった。食料を積んだ無防備なキャラバンを襲撃したのだ。ギャングどもはその食料や飲料が強力な毒物で味付けされていることに気づかずごちそうを食べた。ほどなくして突然死の波がウエストランドを襲い、無慈悲な制裁攻撃がそれに続いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你派出了一支满载食物、毫无防备的商队，引擎破坏者果然上钩了。所有人都在大快朵颐，根本不知道食物和饮料中被下了剧毒。随即，突如其来的死亡浪潮很快席卷了荒地，无情的惩戒接踵而至。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vandals took the bait: a defenceless caravan laden with provisions. The gangs feasted, unaware that the food and drink were flavoured with powerful toxins. A wave of sudden deaths soon swept across the wastelands, followed by a ruthless punitive raid.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vandallar; erzak yüklü, savunmasız kervan yemini yuttu. Çeteler, yiyecek ve içeceklere güçlü toksinler konulduğunun farkına varmadan bir güzel ziyafet çekti. Kısa süre sonra çorak diyarı anı bir ölüm dalgası sardı, sonrasında ise acımasız bir cezai baskın gerçekleşti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Vandals took the bait: a defenceless caravan laden with provisions. The gangs feasted, unaware that the food and drink were flavoured with powerful toxins. A wave of sudden deaths soon swept across the wastelands, followed by a ruthless punitive raid.{/n}
